description:
nova-api fails. " ImportError: cannot import name deploy "

So I did
apt-get install python-paste
apt-get install python-pastedeploy

I found them in pip-requires, but I could not find them in nova.sh.
title: python-pastedeploy and  python-paste is not installed by nova.sh install
